content: उपक्रम् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go near, approach, come to, advance towards; राज्ञस्तस्याज्ञया देवी वसिष्ठमुपचक्रमे <ls>Mb.</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To do, perform, set about; यथोक्तं निपुणमुपक्रांतवान् <ls>Dk. 120</ls>; माधवसमक्षमुत्तरमुपक्रमिष्ये <ls>Māl. 3</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">2. 7</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 200.</ls> {@--3@} To begin, commence. (with <ab>inf.</ab> or <ab>dat.</ab>); (<ab>Atm.</ab>); प्रसभं वक्तुमुपक्रमेत कः <ls>Ki. 2. 28</ls>; प्रतिग्रहीतुं… त्रिलोचनस्तामुपचक्रमे च <ls>Ku. 3. 66</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 13.</ls> {@--4@} To go against, attack, assail, उपचक्रमाते वाग्भिः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--5@} To make advances (of love) to; सर्वोपायैरुपक्रम्य सीतां <ls>Rām.</ls>; win over; <ls>Dk. 65.</ls> {@--6@} To step over, stride, traverse. {@--7@} To treat, act towards, attend on (as a physician); cure or heal (as wounds); यत्नादुपक्रम्यतां <ls>Ś. 3</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; सर्वथोपक्रांतः <ls>Dk. 68</ls>; °व्रणा <ls n="Dk.">75.</ls>
